articles.title: Oh, duck!: Man trying to bring six kilos of meat into Australia has visa axed - SBS News
articles.description: A traveller with six kilograms of meat in his baggage has had his visa cancelled, with politicians saying he'd posed an "enormous" risk to farmers.
articles.content: The man had declared on his incoming passenger card that he was not bringing any meat, poultry, or other food into Australia. Source: Getty / BIANCA DE MARCHI
